Class: IServTool

IServTool(ServerHost, username, password, keepaliveopt, logopt, reuseCookiesopt)

new IServTool(ServerHost, username, password, keepaliveopt, logopt, reuseCookiesopt)

Create a IServTool instance
Parameters:
Name Type Attributes Default Description
ServerHost String the host of the IServ Instance. Without protocol
username String username used for login
password String password used for login
keepalive boolean <optional>
 Not yet implemented
log boolean <optional>
 false Enable debug logging
reuseCookies boolean <optional>
 save cookies and reuse them. only works for one user
Version:
  • 0.2
Author:
  • dunklesToast / Tom Sacher
